channel.title: Trailers on Marlon Wiebe
channel.description: Recent content in Trailers on Marlon Wiebe

item.title: Black Future '88
item.description: Black Future ‘88’s neon-lit retro-future style paints a dark alternate history of a world reeling from a nuclear cataclysm created by Duncan, the tower architect.

item.title: Into the Breach Launch
item.description: Control powerful mechs from the future to defeat an alien threat. Each attempt to save the world presents a new randomly generated challenge in this turn-based strategy game.

item.title: Where The Water Tastes Like Wine
item.description: Where the Water Tastes Like Wine is a Narrative-Adventure game about traveling, sharing stories, and surviving manifest destiny.

item.title: Full Metal Furies
item.description: From the creators of Rogue Legacy comes a “true-cooperative” action RPG. Full Metal Furies puts an emphasis on team play with a unique combat system where everyone is important.

item.title: Industries of Titan
item.description: My first attempt at working with 3D keyframed animations in-engine for this innovative sim-strategy game by the Crypt of the Necrodancer devs.

item.title: Redeemer
item.description: Punch, hack, and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers, fire arms, and even the environment.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon DLC
item.description: There’s something in the blood in Darkest Dungeon’s DLC…

item.title: Brigador Up Armored Edition
item.description: Experience destructible environments with 56 different playable vehicles in roguelite isometric mayhem. Great Leader is dead! Liberate Solo Nobre tonight.

item.title: Immortal Redneck
item.description: Rogue Legacy meets an FPS in Egypt, with an unlikely hero.

item.title: Into the Breach Announcement Trailer
item.description: Use your mechs to defend the last cities on earth from being destroyed by giant monsters in this turn-based tactics game by the makers of FTL.

item.title: Stage Presence
item.description: Your bands gear fries onstage and it’s up to you to keep the crowd from rioting in this free-form music game.

item.title: Holoball
item.description: Use your wits and your paddles to win against a rogue AI in order to win your freedom in this 80s inspired neon soaked VR raquetball game.

item.title: Quote
item.description: Burn every book. Kill every author. Purify the world for the God of Ignorance.

item.title: Orwell
item.description: Papers, Please meets the NSA surveillance state in Orwell.

item.title: Duskers Launch Trailer
item.description: Pilot your drones through derelict spaceships in Misfit Attic’s hyper-atmospheric Duskers.

item.title: Parkitect
item.description: Watch all 3 silly mini-trailers I helped produce for this Rollercoaster Tycoon 1&2 spiritual successor!

item.title: NecroDancer Plushie Commercial
item.description: Own a physical singing version of the merchant from Crypt of the Necrodancer!

item.title: Zombie Night Terror
item.description: A lemmings-like game teeming with hordes of zombies aiming to destroy humanity.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon Launch
item.description: The critically acclaimed stress management RPG Darkest Dungeon finally comes out of Early Access!

item.title: Monsters and Monocles PSX Announcement
item.description: Monsters and Monocles is a tale of comrades, ballistics & high tea. This co-op twin stick shooter has style for days!

item.title: Severed PSX 2015
item.description: The hyper stylized dungeon crawling slash-em-up from the studio that brought you Guacamelee!

item.title: Starsector
item.description: Build up your fleet, micro manage your ships, and engage in epic galactic battles in Starsector!

item.title: Future Unfolding
item.description: Explore the lush, procedurally generated world of Future Unfolding, the new game from Spaces of Play, the creators of the hit game Spirits.

item.title: Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime
item.description: ALERT! ALERT! Lovers HQ has been destroyed by Anti-Love! You and a friend must work together to defeat evil and restore love in this intense co-op game.

item.title: Fuego!
item.description: An online simultaneous turn-based Mexican standoff game that gets it right. Play against friends online or go solo in puzzle mode.

item.title: Cryptark
item.description: Derelict spaceships are floating through the galaxy ready to be stripped of scrap. But it won’t be easy. You need to plan your assault, choose your weapons wisely, and don’t waste your ammo! It ain’t cheap.

item.title: Duskers Early Access
item.description: Survive in space by sending your drones into derelict spaceships and scavenging what you can. But be careful, one false step could mean your drones are gone for good.

item.title: ROCKETS ROCKETS ROCKETS
item.description: Radial Games’ multiplayer shoot-em-up has you flying Rockets that shoot Rockets at other Rockets.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon Early Access
item.description: Assemble your team and uncover the Lovecraftian horrors that lurk beneath the Darkest Dungeon. But beware, the sights seen below will forever affect your troops.

item.title: Axiom Verge
item.description: Uncover the mystery of a surreal alien world by glitching out your envrionment and exploring Metroid style.

item.title: Severed
item.description: Stylish touchscreen slash-em-up action game by the studio that brought you Guacamelee.

item.title: Crypt of the Necrodancer
item.description: The world’s one and only roguelike rhythm game beats it’s way into Early Access and into your heart.

item.title: Viking Squad
item.description: Beat up bears in barrels wielding fish in this frenetic lane-based brawler by Slick Entertainment.

item.title: FTL - Advanced Edition
item.description: A free update to the popular FTL game adds new game modes and a new alien species.
